inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Spirometry revealed a forced expiratory volume in the first second (FEV1) of 60% of the predicted

inclusion.criterion: presenting to an emergency department with acute asthma
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough. He was admitted to the emergency department with diagnosis of severe asthma exacerbation

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: His past medical history is non-significant

notes: The patient has a significant family history of asthma, but his current condition suggests he may be eligible for the trial.
